short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT - THS 5.1 Computer Application Support (Senior) - Amendment 1
description: This amendment (001) is to extend the closing date to 2022-12-13 02:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST).\\
full_summary:
# NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT - Computer Application Support (Senior)

## Amendment 1 - Extension of Tender Closing Date

### Tender Invitation Reference and Solicitation Details

*   Reference Number: PW-22-01015215
*   Solicitation Number: W6369-23DE25-B
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Publication Date: 2022-11-29
*   Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-13T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2022-12-05

### Contracting Entity Information

*   The Department of National Defence (DND) is the contracting entity for this tender.
*   Contact Information:
    *   Bruce Bates (MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca)

### Tender Description and Details

This procurement is a re-issue of solicitation W6369-23DE25. The tender is open to THS Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified as Tier 1 service providers for the National Capital Region (NCR).

*   Category: Senior 5.1 Computer Application Support
*   Deliverables: Provide senior-level support for software applications to DND.
*   Location: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

*   This procurement is open to bidders under the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   The region of opportunity is the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Tender Submission Requirements

*   Tender submissions must be received by 2022-12-13 14:00:00.
*   Tender documents can be found in the attachment section below.

### Document Downloads
